data.title: Fix TIFF linking by using imported target TIFF::TIFF

show errors and check exit code for wheel filename formatting

Small fix for drag selection not being correct on mouse up event.

Add env var to skip binding ESC to quit Pangolin
working with multiple textures, and some more readable examples for shaders
